Content:
For me, it's my Harbor Freight motorcycle lift. The wheel chock it comes with is worthless, but the one in the picture works pretty well. At 82 years old I really appreciate being able to adjust the height of the bike so that I don't have to get on my knees or even lay on the floor to do work on my bikes.

Second would be my Harbor Freight tire changer, for some of the same reasons.
